AnyFieldSettings.description: Any of the supported field settings. Note that the discriminator of this type is only informational and does not need to be specified in requests, while the actual evaluated discriminator is Field.typeId
AnyFieldSettings.title: AnyFieldSettings

ErrorResponse.description: A general error response which is returned by the server for all handled errors.

data.description: Additional informational data about the error

ErrorResponse.title: ErrorResponse

fields.description: Values of custom fields, where each key is a custom-field ID and each value is a JSON-formatted value of the corresponding field.

c7824f3d-4d5f-3b2f-a2d0-34758c1e9454.text: A platform built for the new way of doing product management

ItemAttachment.description: A connection link between an item and an uploaded attachment.

createdAt.description: When this attachment link has been created.

itemId.description: ID of the item to which the attachment is linked.

lastUpdatedAt.description: When this attachment link has been updated for the last time.

name.description: Name of the attachment, e.g. its file name (to be displayed in UI).

uri.description: URI of the attachment contents. It can be any URI, but conventionally it's a relative URI like 'attachment:1ecb9ecd-8a97-403a-a74a-741eb4b8fb69' with UUID of a file uploaded to airfocus file-storage. Such URI is then resolved by clients into a full HTTPS URL.

ItemAttachment.title: ItemAttachment

ItemAttachmentWithEmbed.description: A connection link between an item and an uploaded attachment.

createdAt.description: When this attachment link has been created.

itemId.description: ID of the item to which the attachment is linked.

lastUpdatedAt.description: When this attachment link has been updated for the last time.

name.description: Name of the attachment, e.g. its file name (to be displayed in UI).

uri.description: URI of the attachment contents. It can be any URI, but conventionally it's a relative URI like 'attachment:1ecb9ecd-8a97-403a-a74a-741eb4b8fb69' with UUID of a file uploaded to airfocus file-storage. Such URI is then resolved by clients into a full HTTPS URL.

ItemAttachmentWithEmbed.title: ItemAttachmentWithEmbed

fromOrder.description: How this link is ordered in the list of links of the "fromItem".

toOrder.description: How this link is ordered in the list of links of the "toItem".

includeArchived.description: Also include links which connect archived items.

itemIds.description: Return only those links which connect the specified items.

workspaceIds.description: Return only those links which connect items in the specified workspaces.

ItemLinkType.description: Type of a link. At the moment only one type "dependency" is supported.
ItemLinkType.title: ItemLinkType

fromOrder.description: How this link is ordered in the list of links of the "fromItem".

toOrder.description: How this link is ordered in the list of links of the "toItem".

fields.description: Values of custom fields, where each key is a custom-field ID and each value is a JSON-formatted value of the corresponding field.

JsonPatch.description: A JSON Patch document. See https://jsonpatch.com/ for more information.
JsonPatch.title: JsonPatch

oneOf.description: A combination of 'fieldid:' prefix and a UUID field-id.

duplicatePermissions.description: Whether to also duplicate all user-permissions to the new workspace.

permissions.description: Explicit permissions for specific users in the team.

post.description:
Returns newly created workspace with its sanitised data.
Requirements:
- auth-client scopes: "workspace"
- user permission: "write" or higher
Returns:
401 if user does not have the required permission

Accepts a list of create/update/patch/delete operations (see the request model for more details).
Each operations can target a single or multiple workspaces.
Returns a list of results for each input operation including errors.
Guarantees that the size and order of the returned results matches the input list of operations.
Requirements:
- auth-client scopes: "workspace"
- user permission: "write" or higher
Returns:
401 if user does not have the required permission

- user permission: "read" or higher
Returns:
401 if user does not have the required permission

post.description:
Returns ids of newly copied items, with order of the returned ids matching the order of requested source items. Returns Not Found if either of the specified source items does not exist.

- auth-client scopes: "workspace"
- user permission: "write" or higher
Returns:
400 if the resource is not found
401 if user does not have the required permission

tags.description: Connect items with uploaded attachment-files. Note: this module is not responsible for uploading files, it only manages the links between items and files.
tags.name: ItemAttachments
